name: Strobo Hobo
description:
This is an idea I had while watching SGDQ - took a week off of work and made this. It's fun, it kinda works and I decided to just push  it out after 2 years, no reason to hold onto this one.

Features:

  • 16 progressively harder levels,
  • Tight controls,
  • Custom made music,
  • between 5 and infinite minutes of gameplay time (depending on how bad you are).

I might at some point get back to it - mostly missing more levels and it seems like the online scores server is down.
